title: Drawing, "Chest:: Four Drawers, Low, Long Rectangular Pulls-Off Center, and Mirror (Round)", September 1, 1933
title_raw: Chest:: Four Drawers, Low, Long Rectangular Pulls-Off Center, and Mirror (Round)
medium: Graphite, red color pencil on tracing paper
markings: Stamped in black ink: in upper right hand corner, DONALD DESKEY/ ASSOCIATES; in lower right hand corner, DONALD DESKEY/ 145 WEST 57TH STREET/ NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed dimensions in graphite on left. Inscribed in graphite: lower left hand corner, BL-S-W;  lower right, Same mirror as/ dress[ing] Table but/ in scale with/ Dresser. OK; lower right hand corner [Deskey #] 7207. Iscribed in red color pencil, lower right hand corner, P

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "Chest:: Four Drawers, Low, Long Rectangular Pulls-Off Center, and Mirror (Round)", September 1, 1933. Graphite, red color pencil on tracing paper. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1988-101-1786.
